CustomField.description: Used to establish lead qualification, used in Lead Type field, which is mapped to Opportunity. Used with Distribution Engine for lead assignments.
CustomField.formula: if ( TEXT(Status)="Test", "Test", if ( Babys_Due_Date__c < TODAY()+30, "Hot", if ( TEXT(LeadSource)= "Returning Client", "Hot", if ( ISNULL(Babys_Due_Date__c), "Cool", if (CONTAINS(mkto71_Acquisition_Program__c, "Birth Plan"), "Cold", IF ( OR( CONTAINS(mkto71_Acquisition_Program__c, "Pricing Calculator"), ISBLANK(mkto71_Acquisition_Program__c), TEXT(LeadSource) = "Client Referral", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Consumer Affairs", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Employee Referral", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Live Chat", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Surrogacy Group", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Parents Guide", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Ambassador", TEXT(LeadSource) = "Google"), "Warm", "Cool"))))))
CustomField.label: Lead Qualification new
